name: MarketRace
description:
Try to buy all the products before your opponent!! 1vs1 Local

CONTROLS:

Player 1->

  • W/A/S/D to move
  • "H" to pick the product
  • "J" to use an object

Player 1->

  • Arrows to move
  • "1" to pick the product
  • "2" to use an object
¿HOW TO PLAY?

Pick all the products in your list and pay at the cash register before your opponent. When you pick a product you will also take an object to annoy your opponent.
